title: Gloves

properties.name: description
properties.value: Gloves are pieces of armour that players can wear in the hands slot. These are the many different types of gloves that players can wear in Old School RuneScape.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Gloves
For all items and their stats worn in this slot, see this table
See also: Vambraces and Gauntlets

Gloves are pieces of armour that players can wear in the hands slot. These are the many different types of gloves that players can wear in Old School RuneScape.

Image Name Notes Equip Level Members
Adamant gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing seven subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Antisanta gloves Reward for completing the 2014 Christmas event. None 0
Barrows gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing the Recipe for Disaster quest. None 1
Black gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing five subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Bronze gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing two subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Cow gloves Reward for opening a birthday present during Old School RuneScape's birthdays. None 0
Dragon gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing nine subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Ferocious gloves Created from Hydra leather after the Dragon Slayer II quest. Hydra leather is obtained as a drop from the Alchemical Hydra. 80
80 , Dragon Slayer II 		1
Ghostly gloves Obtained by completing a random section of the ghostly robes miniquest. None 1




 Canifis gloves Obtainable after completing Priest in Peril from the Canifis Clothing store. None 0
Fremennik gloves Bought from Yrsa's Clothing Shop in Rellekka. None 1
Gloves of silence Made from dark kebbit fur. Slightly reduces chances of being caught while pickpocketing. 54 1
Graceful gloves Purchasable from Grace's shop within the Rogues' Den for 30 marks of grace. None 1
Granite gloves Obtained as a drop from the Grotesque Guardians. 50
50 		1
Ham gloves Obtained by pickpocketing H.A.M. members, or killing H.A.M. guards. None 1
Hardleather gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing one subquest in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Ice gloves Obtained by killing the Ice Queen. Used in Heroes' Quest and Recipe for Disaster. Helpful in Desert Treasure. None 1
Infinity gloves Bought at the Mage Training Arena. 50
25 		1
Iron gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing three subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Karamja gloves 1 Reward for completing all the easy tasks in the Karamja Diary. None 1
Karamja gloves 2 Reward for completing all the medium tasks in the Karamja Diary. None 1
Karamja gloves 3 Reward for completing all the hard tasks in the Karamja Diary. None 1
Karamja gloves 4 Reward for completing all the elite tasks in the Karamja Diary. None 1
Leather gloves Created using the Crafting skill from soft leather. None 0
Lunar gloves Created during Lunar Diplomacy. 65
40 		1
Mime gloves A possible reward from the Mime's random event. None 0
Mithril gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing six subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Moonclan gloves Can be purchased from the clothing store on Lunar Isle after Lunar Diplomacy. None 1
Mourner gloves Obtained during Mourning's End Part I. None 1
Mystic gloves Blue mystic gloves can be bought in the Wizards' Guild while white and black mystic gloves can be obtained as monster drops from certain Slayer monsters. 40 20 1
Penance gloves Obtained by exchanging Honour Points in the Barbarian Assault minigame. One of the few items that reduce weight. None 1
Rockshell gloves Dropped by Giant rock crabs at Waterbirth Island. None 1
Rogue gloves Possible reward for completing the Rogues' Den minigame. None 1
Rune gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing eight subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Santa gloves Reward for completing the 2014 Christmas event. None 0
Skeletal gloves Obtained as a drop from Wallasalki. None 1
Skeleton gloves Reward for completing Halloween events. None 0
Slayer gloves Bought from any Slayer Master. Worn to fight Fever spiders. 42 1
Spined gloves Dropped by Dagannoths at Waterbirth Island. None 1
Steel gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing four subquests in Recipe for Disaster. None 1
Void knight gloves Reward from the Pest Control minigame. 42

White gloves Special metal gloves that can be purchased after completing Wanted!. 10 1
Zombie gloves A possible reward from Leo's random event. None 0
